About Me

The core of my skill set relies heavily upon the MERN stack, to be able to achieve a smooth and dynamic user experience. Currently some of my primary goals are to improve my JavaScript and ReactJS capabilities. As well as dabble in some other frameworks like AngularJS or VueJS to expand my tech stack and knowledge.
